# loadingPriority

**Instance Property**

A hint to the system of the relative priority of the resource request.

## Declaration

```swift
var loadingPriority: Double { get set }
```

## Discussion

Possible values are between `0.0` and `1.0` or the special constant [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSBundleResourceRequestLoadingPriorityUrgent]. The default is `0.5`. The system will attempt to give higher priority to requests with higher values. You can change the priority at any time, including during downloading of the managed resources.

## Setting the Download Priority

- **NSBundleResourceRequestLoadingPriorityUrgent**
title: loadingPriority
